descriptions:
["DescriptionBoasting some of the region's most attractive landscapes and amenities, Yas Acres puts community at its heart, providing you with solid ground to lay down roots and build memories. Yas Acres embraces a love of leisure and provides you with a world of possibilities to explore and experience at your pace. Whether it is on the golf course, at the mall, by the pool or simply at home with family, Yas Acres offers you the space to nurture the lifestyle of your choice and cherish the moments that matter the most to you.
It is a multipurpose hub for entertainment, shopping and tourism, connected to the mainland through a comprehensively linked road network.It is already home to the Yas Marina Circuit, which hosts the Abu Dhabi Formula 1 Grand Prix each year. It boasts major retail in the form of Yas Mall and IKEA. Two theme parks are in operation - Yas Waterworld and Ferrari World - with more marked out for development in the future. Yas Island is home to exceptional hospitality and leisure venues such as Yas Links, Yas Marina, Yas Plaza, The Viceroy and du Arena. Looking to the future, the population is expected to grow significantly with many more projects planned and under development.The Yas Acres Golf & Country Club will also include a wide range of facilities for the entire family such as a multipurpose sports hall, squash and tennis courts, kids activity area, spa and swimming pools.                                            
Running through the middle of Yas Acres with the golf course from one side and public parks which open out onto North Yas Island's waterfront from the other, Royal Oak speaks to the most sophisticated of homeowners.
Reach out to our team at Property Shop Investment to get more details about this property or to schedule a viewing. Call us on +971600548200 or access www.propertyshopinvestment.com."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionNad Al Sheba Gardens is a land development project by Meraas, sixteen kilometres from City Walk and close to the Al Ain Road. Freehold plots are now available on a flexible payment plan; with the option to build Ground Plus One (G+1) and Ground Plus Six (G+6) residential buildings and villas. 
- 5 years payment plan 
- 100% DLD waiver
- Zero service charge 
We offer two zonings in the area, Buildings and Residential Villas.
* Usage: Residential Villa
* Type 1: 10,000 sq.ft.
* Permitted Height: G+1
* Permitted 2 villas per plot
FAR: 1
* Type 2: 5,000 sq.ft.
* Permitted Height: G+1
* Permitted 1 villa per plot
FAR: 0.9
* Ownership: 100% Freehold
* Early Access is provided upon covering 50% of payment
* Resale is permitted upon covering 65% of payment
* No service charges
* No time limit to construct
* The development follows Dubai Development Authority (DDA) 
* Payment Plan of three years
* Residential building plots G+6 also available
The proposed land uses also include retail, community facilities (a masjid, school, and hospital), district and neighborhood parks and open recreation spaces for active and passive recreation. Nad Al Sheba Gardens is strategically located adjacent to Meydan development and Mohammed Bin Rashid City

Nakheel themselves have developed 4 townhouse and villa communities in JVC, but the rest of the community consists of projects built by private developers."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionAn exciting opportunity to buy property in the exclusive Lime Tree Valley Community within Jumeirah Golf Estates. This 5 BR Girona style home with a spacious open plan layout, is located on the 14thhole of the Earth course.
The ground floor features an en-suite guest room and a family kitchen with a breakfast room. This flows through to the formal lounge and dining area, and a family room that opens to the garden. A private swimming pool and BBQ area enjoy unparalleled views across the golf course.
The first floor hosts four further generously sized bedroom suites. The Master Bedroom features a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with his and hers vanity units. There is also a first-floor living area adjacent to the 2 front-facing bedrooms.
This property presents great potential for extension and remodellingto create the perfect family home.
The property is fronted by a double garage, and also hosts an ensuite maid's room.
For more information, please contact Lisa Mackenzie on +971564847538."]
